text.en: I pray to the lord of the maṇḍala, seated amidst an ocean
Of absolute perfection, the purified dependent nature,
A vidyādhara with power over unchanging longevity,
In primordially immutable and vajra-like great bliss.2
text.en-trans: zhuk dzé khorlö gönpor solwa deb

text.en: Through the blessings of the Mañjughoṣa Guru,3
text.en-trans: jamyang lamé jin gyi labpa lé

text.en: You came to hold a treasury of Dharma jewels, profound and vast,
text.en-trans: zabgyé chö tsul norbü dzö chang shing

text.en: And perfectly bound the bindu within the central channel—
Guru of genuine discipline, to you I pray.
Dance-like emanation, magical embodiment of the wisdom
text.en-trans: lo tsa chenpo nampar nang dzé kyi

text.en: Of the three secrets of the great translator Vairotsana,
text.en-trans: sang sum yeshe drawé gyutrul gar

text.en: Your activity to train the beings of this degenerate age—
Chimé Nangdzé Dorje,4to you I pray.
text.en-trans: chimé nang dzé dorjé solwa deb
